msbt.message: Are you OK with ? The world of Animal Crossing is welcoming to all, so don't include personal info or offensive words.
Are you OK with ? The world of Animal Crossing is welcoming to all, so don't include personal info or offensive words.
You've included a word or phrase that can't be used.
You can only use up to 5 numbers.
Are you sure you want to delete your save data, ? You won't be able to undo your decision.
Are you sure you want to delete 's save data? You won't be able to undo your decision.
You're a little short on materials.
Your pockets are too full for doing any DIY projects right now.
Nothing changed! Select a design that is different from the current one.

Some items can be customized with a custom design. Items customized with a custom design cannot be dropped on the ground. If a custom design is updated, any items customized with it will use the updated design.
You don't have any songs you can register!
Your pockets are too full to hold this.
Your pockets are too full to hold this.
Hold on just a sec, OK?
You can't favorite a message if you haven't even read it yet!
You can't throw away favorited messages!
You can favorite up to messages.
You can't throw away message cards that have presents attached!
You've received a message card from a friend! You can create and send message cards at the airport.

Once a message card is received, it is saved on the Nintendo Switch system and can't be received again. Unreceived message cards are stored on the server for 90 days. After 90 days, they are deleted.You can have up to 300 message cards saved on the server. Once you exceed that amount, message cards will be deleted in order from oldest to newest, and the deleted cards can't be received.
You don't have anywhere to put the clothes you're removing.

You can now use your closet to edit wand outfits!If you use the Edit Wand Outfits option to create outfits, you can later switch into them using a wand.Using a wand outfit is considered a transformation, rather than actually changing your clothes.What you're wearing underneath the transformation will not change.
You can't change with a wet suit on.
You're not wearing anything that can be part of an outfit!
This outfit can't fit in your storage right now.
Only Nook Miles+ members can order this item. The Nook Miles+ service is for customers with home contracts.
Miles-redemption mail orders are limited to 5 items per day.
You don't have enough heart crystals!

About Local and Online Play During local and online play, other players you play with can see player- generated text and graphics such as:names, chat, bulletin-board posts, the look of the entire island, rooms in homes, custom designs, and other content. Please be mindful of the content you share with others as you enjoy communicating with them.
Sorry, that island can't accommodate any more visitors right now.

Be considerate! Please do not share illegal content, personal information, content that infringes on the rights of others, or content that irritates others.Please don't cheat or behave in a way that would irritate other players. The Nintendo Code of Conduct applies to in-game behavior and any shared content.If your content or behavior is deemed to violate the Nintendo Code of Conduct, action can be taken, including deleting content from the server or restricting access to online play.You can press  to report inappropriate content and behavior.
Please be mindful of the Nintendo Code of Conduct, and be considerate of other players.
The session was forcibly ended because a visitor or host didn't end a conversation or close a window within a set amount of time. Your save data will be reverted to the last time it was updated.
Destination info cannot be shown due to a communications error.
Do you want to try to connect to the internet again?
Your profile could not be sent. If this process fails repeatedly, please retake your profile photo and try again.

Important Info on Sharing Dreams When you share a dream of your island, other players—including ones you don't know—will be able to visit a version of your island.That means that player-generated data about your island and its residents—captured at the time the dream is shared—will be made public.This data includes your name, your passport info, the look of your entire island, rooms in homes, your custom designs, any bulletin-board posts, and more.

Important Info on Sharing Dreams When you share a dream of your island, other players—including ones you don't know—will be able to visit a version of your island.That means that data about your island and its residents—captured at the time the dream is shared—will be made public.This data includes your name, your passport info for all residents, the look of your entire island, rooms in homes, your custom designs, any bulletin-board posts, and more.
Do you want to remove the dream of from the list?
Your favorite dreams cannot be removed from the list.
You can make up to two posts during one trip.
You can make a maximum of two posts per trip.
Do you want to erase everything you drew by hand? (You can't undo this!)
Do you want to stop writing?
Do you want to stop editing with the keyboard? *Anything you've entered this time will be removed.
Order for ? To equip a new phone case, use the customization option at a workbench.
Order for ? To equip a new phone case, use the customization option at a workbench.
Your order has been placed! Your order will be delivered shortly to your home through the mail.
Catalog orders are limited to a maximum of 5 items per customer per day.
That'll be . Would you like to send this item?
Do you want to erase this card and cancel your order for ?
This item is not for sale and can't be ordered right now.
The item could not be sent. Do you want to try again?
Sending item... Do not touch  while saving.
The item's cost of will be returned.
The item was sent off to .
You can't place orders while company is around.
You can't place orders while you're visiting another player's island.
You can't place orders while the airport gate is open.
You can't place orders at this time. Please close the connection at the airport counter.
You can't place orders at this time.
Are you sure you want to delete ?
Are you sure you want to delete , designed by ?
Select a custom design that can be deleted.
Are you sure you want to delete , saved by ?
Are you sure you want to overwrite ?
Are you sure you want to overwrite , designed by ?
Are you sure you want to overwrite , saved by ?
Deleting save data. Do not touch the  POWER Button.
The system is set to a date outside the supported range.Please close the game from the HOME Menu and restart after setting a date between 1/1/2000 and 12/31/2060.
The save data is damaged. Would you like to delete the damaged save data and start the game over?
The game cannot be played with damaged save data. Please close the game from the HOME Menu.
The save data has been deleted. The game will now start.
It looks like your language settings have changed since the last time you played.
Character names and UI elements vary from language to language. Do you still want to start playing?
Please revert your language settings via the System Settings in the HOME Menu and restart the game.

Sent a Best Friend request to .
The Best Friend designation between you and has been removed.
You cannot send a request because you've reached the Best Friends limit.
You cannot send a request because you've reached your request limit.
You can't send a request because the person you want to send it to has reached their request limit.
You can't become Best Friends because you've reached the Best Friends limit.
You can't become Best Friends because you've reached your limit for requests.
This request has already been withdrawn.
You can't remove someone from your Best Friends List while you are playing with them.
The other person has performed an action, so the list will now update.
Are you sure you want to stop being Best Friends?
You can't use this when a local wireless connection is active.
You can't use this when playing with other residents via Party Play.
At least one Best Friend is required before you can toggle this option.
The list must be updated before your request can be processed. Would you like to update the list now?
An internet connection is required to use this feature. Do you want to connect to the internet?
Please press  to enable the communication feature and the ability to send messages.
is offline, so you can't send messages to them right now.
You can't send messages when no other players are online.

You'll need to connect to the internet before using the Best Friends List app here. Connect now?
Are you sure you want to discard your changes?
Do you want to revert all the color changes you just made?

The controller you are using cannot be used to read amiibo. Please use a controller that is compatible with amiibo. Note that the Pro Controller cannot read amiibo while connected to the system via wired communication.
Up to 10 characters can be invited at once.
There's no free space available to invite this character.
Would you like to call Timmy or Tommy?
You can't invite the Villager to Photopia.
When Airplane Mode is on, amiibo can't be read. Hold down  to access Quick Settings, where you can turn off Airplane Mode.
The device used is not an amiibo.
This isn't any different from your current home!
doesn't have a home yet and can't receive mail.
The report could not be sent.
You can't send reports when using local wireless communication.
You have not connected to the internet yet, so you can't send a report.
You can't report this displayed design.
You can't submit a report on your own account.
This post was not made by an online player. A report can be sent instead for , who has not deleted the post.
This custom-design display was not made by an online player. A report can be sent for , who has not deleted the design.
You don't have room in your pockets for this purchase!
You don't have room for this purchase in your pockets or storage.
Do you want to wear what you picked out?
Do you want to connect to the internet and download a custom design made for Nintendo 3DS games?
A custom design named was found. Please select a save slot.
A Pro custom design named was found. Please select a save slot.

We couldn't find any downloadable custom designs made for Nintendo 3DS games.
Please access NookLink from the Nintendo Switch Online app to scan a QR Code.
You've unlocked the Pro design tab.

Pro Designs Pro designs offer players greater control over the finer details of their designs.You'll need to upgrade your Custom Designs app to edit or create Pro designs. Even if you don't upgrade, you can still wear Pro designs.You can upgrade the Custom Designs app by redeeming Nook Miles at the Nook Stop in Resident Services.
You don't currently have any savings.
You can't add more to your savings.
You have no room for a withdrawal!
When your fee is transferred, any Bells that don't fit in your bank account will be lost. Is that OK?

Content you've set in your profile is in violation of the Nintendo Code of Conduct. Please review your passport photo and/or profile comment and adjust them so they won't cause discomfort to other players who may view them.

Please Read Before Posting Designs The custom designs you post can be viewed by other players around the world.Please do not post designs that contain illegal content or would make other players uncomfortable.Posted designs can be deleted from the server if they are deemed to be inappropriate and in violation of the Nintendo Code of Conduct.
Your creation is posted! The design ID is . Would you like to share this info on social media?
Your creation could not be posted. Would you like to try again?
Are you done using the kiosk?
Thank you for your interest in posting designs!You are now registered as a creator. Your ID is . You can check your creator ID at any time from the Passport app on your NookPhone.
Would you like to post another creation?
You've reached the limit for the number of custom designs you can post. Please select one to delete.
You don't seem to have any custom designs of your own. Please try again after you've made a custom design.
It seems this design has already been posted. You can repost it if you edit it.
You entered your own creator ID. Do you want to view your own designs, ?
There is no design listed with the ID of . Would you like to enter the ID again?
There are no designs for creator ID . Would you like to enter the ID again?
There are no designs for creator ID .
The custom design has been deleted.
Please select a design to post.
... Are you sure you want to delete this custom design?
You don't have any posted designs.
The Custom Designs app will now open. Please select a save slot.
You have entered the design ID of one of your own designs. Do you want to view your designs?
An error has prevented the design from being shared on social media.
has been removed from your favorites.
Your list of favorite creators is full. You cannot add any more favorites at this time.
Your search criteria did not match any designs. Do you want to redo your criteria and search again?

New Custom-Design Search Options You can now search for custom designs from your favorite creators or by using a criteria search.Criteria Search Use this option to search for designs by name or type.Favorites Search Use this option to search for designs by creators who you have added to your list of favorites.You can add a creator to your list of favorites while you're viewing one of their designs. We hope you enjoy these new search features!

Custom-Design Types You can now assign a type to all custom designs (excluding Pro designs) to facilitate searching. Just press  to assign a type to your design. Previously posted designs can also be assigned a type.Setting a type does not limit how a custom design can be used. Also, it is possible to change a design's type even after it has been posted.
No designs found associated with creator ID . Do you want to make a different selection?
Each player can send up to 2 messages per day online through Nook Shopping.
A voucher you can sell in the shop for 3,000 Bells. This voucher is issued immediately.
Take this ticket to the airport to participate in a special tour. Enquire at the airport for details. This ticket is issued immediately.
A collection of 6 DIY recipes for tools with excellent durability. Data will be sent to the customer's NookPhone upon redemption.
Allows you to use the Tool Ring to easily swap between favorite tools. Detailed information will be printed upon redemption.
Change up your look at a mirror or vanity with these cool hairstyles! Book will be printed immediately upon redemption.
Change up your look at a mirror or vanity with these pop hairstyles! Book will be printed immediately upon redemption.
Change up your look at a mirror or vanity with these new hair colors! Book will be printed immediately upon redemption.
Information on pocket organization so you can carry more items. Printed immediately upon redemption.
Information on mastering pocket organization for carrying even more. Printed immediately upon redemption.
Adds professional design features to the customer's Custom Designs app. App will be updated immediately.
A special DIY recipe only obtainable by redeeming miles. Useful for customizing your island. Recipe will be printed immediately.
A special item only obtainable by redeeming miles. Useful for customizing your island. Item will be delivered by mail.
A DIY recipe for fencing for around your home or garden. Useful for customizing your island. Recipe will be printed immediately.
A kit to swap your NookPhone case to a different design. It can be used at a workbench. Kit will be delivered by mail.
Adds a cliff construction permit to the Island Designer app, allowing the creation and destruction of cliffs. App will be updated immediately.
Adds a river construction permit to the Island Designer app, allowing the creation and removal of water bodies. App will be updated immediately.
Adds a permit for path design to the Island Designer app. App will be updated immediately.
Adds a permit for custom-design paths to the Island Designer app. App will be updated immediately.
Original Nook Inc. goods. Have fun collecting the whole set— and looking great while you do it! Items will be delivered by mail.
Original Nook Inc. goods: Have fun collecting the whole set and then designing your home interior! Items will be delivered by mail.
A custom-designed wet suit from Nook Inc. Allows the user to swim and dive freely in the ocean. Item will be delivered by mail.
Change up your look at a mirror or a vanity with fun body-paint varieties! Book will be printed immediately upon redemption.
Change up your look at a mirror or a vanity with new eye-color choices! Book will be printed immediately upon redemption.
Learn about a variety of Reactions that'll spice up your island life. Book will be printed immediately upon redemption.
Discover even more hairstyles to try on at a mirror or vanity! Book will be printed immediately upon redemption.
Camera Take pictures using various filters and effects.The pictures will be saved to the Album on the HOME Menu, and other users who use the same system will be able to see them.
Displaying Control Guide Press  to toggle the control guide on or off.You cannot turn the guide off when using the solo horizontal grip on a Joy-Con controller.

Nook Miles You're enrolled in the Nook Mileage Program!Earn Nook Miles for completing island activities.Then trade those miles for various perks and goods at the Nook Stop in the Resident Services center.Make the most out of island life. Earn Nook Miles!

Nook Miles with a +! Your rank has increased and you can now use Nook Miles+ services.Nook Miles+ makes it even easier to earn miles as you go about enjoying island life.There are also special redemption options that only Nook Miles+ members get.Please take advantage of this amazing opportunity!
Critterpedia Check this app for information on the bugs and fish you've caught.
Critterpedia Check this app for information on the bugs, fish, and sea creatures you've caught.
Critterpedia Your app has been upgraded with additional information about the sea creatures you've captured!
DIY Recipes Check this app for info on the DIY Recipes you've collected.You can also register frequently crafted items as favorites, so make good use of it while you DIY!

Call Resident Use this app to invite up to three other residents (players) living on the island to play together in Party Play!Before you begin, you'll need enough controllers for the number of players.

Custom Designs With this app, you can create custom designs to wear on clothing or display around the island. When you save custom designs to the app, you can share them with other island residents.There's a chance that your custom designs will be seen by other players during network play sessions—when you visit another island, for example.Please don't create anything that infringes on others' rights. Don't use private information (yours or anyone else's) or offensive words or images.

Pro Designs Thank you for upgrading to the Pro edition of Custom Designs.The Pro edition allows you to: ・Edit palette colors. ・Create Pro Custom Designs.We hope you enjoy creating custom designs with the Pro editing features!
Custom Designs Marked With  Custom designs you did not make are marked with .You cannot edit custom designs with . If you want to use that design slot, you'll have to delete that design first.
Map Check the map for your current location.You can also press  to change the settings and choose whether to display the minimap during your day-to-day activities.

Passport Your Passport information is shown here.This information may be seen by other players (when visiting another island, for example).You can change your photo, title, or comment at any time. Customize them to show off your style!

Rescue Service Use this service for an emergency situation on the island when your path is blocked and you're stuck!You'll be sent to a place such as your home or Resident Services. Nook Miles are generally required to use this service.

Best Friends List You can use this app to check which friends and Best Friends you've played with.When you are Best Friends with another player, you can tell when they are playing online.If both of you are online, you can use the internet to send direct messages to each other.If you do not want others to know if you are online, or if you do not want to exchange messages, press  to enable or disable this feature.

You can now download custom designs uploaded via NookLink by reading QR Codes made in Nintendo 3DS games. Please access NookLink under Game-Specific Services in the Nintendo Switch Online app for info on reading custom design QR Codes.

Island Designer This app helps you develop and shape the island through construction projects that you direct. You can redeem your Nook Miles at the Nook Stop for additional construction options and new path varieties. There is also a cleanup service in case you are doing construction work and find yourself stuck due to items and such around you. For more information on what this cleanup service involves, or on any of the other app features, please check the manual within the app.So go ahead! Try your hand at this app, and start shaping your island to your own personal preferences!
Nook Shopping You can now access Nook Shopping anytime, anywhere, thanks to this handy-dandy app! Shop at your own pace in a way that matches your own style!

Chat Log You can use this app to review the conversations you've had with other players anywhere, anytime! Maybe you didn't get a chance to read something someone said while you were playing together.Or maybe you want to reread a message sent from a Best Friend who lives far away. Sounds like a pretty convenient app, right?

Party Play Island residents can play together in Party Play, where one player is the Leader and the others are Followers. The Leader and Followers can do different things, but it's easy to switch roles!Playing as the Leader The Leader can play pretty much the way they'd normally play.Changing the Leader You can change the Leader by gently shaking the Leader's controller or selecting the Change Leader option from the Call Resident app.Playing as a Follower Followers can't chat, use the NookPhone, or access their pockets. They can use tools, move furniture, and assist the Leader. Items they get will be sent to the recycle box in Resident Services.
Horizontal Joy-Con Controls Leader  Open NookPhone  Control camera / Swap tools Followers  Equip / Swap tools

Leader Horizontal Joy-Con Controls  Open NookPhone /  Reactions  Control camera / Swap tools
Follower Horizontal Joy-Con Controls  Equip or Swap tools /  Reactions  Pick up /  Repeat Reaction (if known)

Controls Leader Same controls as in normal play.
Followers  Equip / Swap tools

Leader Controls Same controls as normal play.
Follower Controls  Equip or Swap tools  Pick up /  Reactions  Repeat Reaction (if known)

Party Play Island residents can play together in Party Play, where one player is the Leader and the others are Followers. The Leader and Followers can do different things, but it's easy to switch roles!Playing as the Leader The Leader can play pretty much the way they'd normally play.Changing the Leader You can change the Leader by gently shaking the Leader's controller or selecting the Change Leader option from the Call Resident app.Playing as a Follower Followers can't chat, use the NookPhone, or access their pockets. They can use tools, move furniture, and assist the Leader. Items they get will be sent to the recycle box in Resident Services. Horizontal Joy-Con Controls Leader  Open NookPhone  Control camera / Swap tools Followers  Equip / Swap tools

The Leader and Followers can do different things, but it's easy to switch roles!Playing as the Leader The Leader can play pretty much the way they'd normally play.Changing the Leader You can change the Leader by gently shaking the Leader's controller or selecting the Change Leader option from the Call Resident app.Playing as a Follower Followers can't chat, use the NookPhone, or access their pockets. They can use tools, move furniture, and assist the Leader. Items they get will be sent to the recycle box in Resident Services. Leader Horizontal Joy-Con Controls  Open NookPhone /  Reactions  Control camera / Swap tools
Follower Horizontal Joy-Con Controls  Equip or Swap tools /  Reactions  Pick up /  Repeat Reaction (if known)

Party Play Island residents can play together in Party Play, where one player is the Leader and the others are Followers. The Leader and Followers can do different things, but it's easy to switch roles!Playing as the Leader The Leader can play pretty much the way they'd normally play.Changing the Leader You can change the Leader by gently shaking the Leader's controller or selecting the Change Leader option from the Call Resident app.Playing as a Follower Followers can't chat, use the NookPhone, or access their pockets. They can use tools, move furniture, and assist the Leader. Items they get will be sent to the recycle box in Resident Services. Controls Leader Same controls as in normal play.
Followers  Equip / Swap tools

Party Play Island residents can play together in Party Play, where one player is the Leader and the others are Followers. The Leader and Followers can do different things, but it's easy to switch roles!Playing as the Leader The Leader can play pretty much the way they'd normally play.Changing the Leader You can change the Leader by gently shaking the Leader's controller or selecting the Change Leader option from the Call Resident app.Playing as a Follower Followers can't chat, use the NookPhone, or access their pockets. They can use tools, move furniture, and assist the Leader. Items they get will be sent to the recycle box in Resident Services. Leader Controls Same controls as normal play.
Follower Controls  Equip or Swap tools  Pick up /  Reactions  Repeat Reaction (if known)

Congratulations on the construction of your new home! Here are a few tips for comfortable living: Turn lights on or off  Enter decorating mode  Open storage Turn lights on or off You can make the room brighter or dimmer with this option. Enter decorating mode This feature lets you easily make design changes to an entire room. Open storage Access your home's storage to stash or retrieve items.When in your home, you can open your pockets to select furniture or other items and put them in storage.
Chat with other players!Press  to send messages to everyone you are playing with.You can also use the Chat Log app on your NookPhone to see past messages.

During Party Play, changes made to custom designs you're wearing will not be shown automatically.
To show off the changes to a custom design, select the updated design and choose Wear.

You have saved over a custom design that you are currently wearing.
To show off the changes to a custom design, select the updated design and choose Wear.

You saved over a custom design that you're currently wearing.
If you want to wear the new design, please select it and choose Wear after you leave the dream.

You have registered a custom design to a transformation outfit. The design on the outfit will not disappear even if that design is changed with the editor.However, if the custom design is changed and you alter the outfit later or try to store it, please be aware that part of the outfit will be lost.
This outfit includes a custom design. The custom design will not be stored. Do you still want to store this outfit?

Customizable Phone Case Kits These kits can be used to change the appearance of your NookPhone.If you use a custom design, your NookPhone will keep its appearance even if that design is changed later.

Currently, there is existing resident data for on this Nintendo Switch system that is not linked to any user account.Would you like to play using existing resident data and link your user account with it? Or would you prefer to create a new resident?
In that case, you'll start the game as a new participant in the Deserted Island Getaway Package program.
Currently, there is only 1 resident whose data is not linked with a user account.
Currently, there are multiple residents whose data is not linked to any user accounts. Which resident would you like to play as?
Would you like to begin the selection process from the beginning, or would you like to end the game?
Please close the game from the HOME Menu.
Would you like to start playing as island resident ?
You will now start playing the game as island resident .

There is currently resident data for 8 residents on on this Nintendo Switch system. This is the maximum number of residents.Would you like to delete data for a resident to start as a new resident or play as an existing resident that is not currently linked to a user account?

You will need to delete the resident data for one resident before you can start as a new resident.You can select from resident data that is not currently linked to a user account. You cannot delete the data for the Resident Representative.
You will need to delete the resident data for one resident before you can start as a new resident.You can select from resident data that is not currently linked to a user account.

Currently, the only resident data not linked to a user account is for 's Resident Representative. This data cannot be deleted.If you want to delete the data for a different resident, please start the game using the user account for that resident. Then you can press  on the title screen to access the settings and delete that resident.
To close this screen, please close the game from the HOME Menu.

The Nintendo Account linked to this user is different than it was before.Any features that use the internet, like the Best Friends List, will be reset if you play again.Do you want to start playing again as ?
This user does not have a Nintendo Account linked.Any features that use the internet, like the Best Friends List, will be reset if you play again.Do you want to start playing again as ?

The Nintendo Account linked to this user is different than it was before.Any features that use the internet, like the Best Friends List, will be reset if you start playing again. Do you want to start playing again?

The link between this user account and a valid Nintendo Account needs to be verified via the internet.If you begin playing before verifying, all features that use the internet— including the Best Friends List—will be reset.Do you want to reset all features that use the internet and begin playing?
The link between this user account and a valid Nintendo Account needs to be verified via the internet.You will now have a chance to connect to the internet to complete this process.
The link between this user account and a valid Nintendo Account needs to be verified via the internet.You will now have a chance to connect to the internet to complete this process.
Player data for an in-progress move from another island was detected. The moving process will now resume.
Do you want to begin island backup restoration?
The island backup data check is complete. Gameplay will now resume.

The user account you are using does not have a linked Nintendo Account.Do you want to link a Nintendo Account now so you can carry over save data related to features that use the internet, like the Best Friends List?
If you do not link a Nintendo Account before proceeding, all features that use the internet will be reset. Do you want to proceed?

The Nintendo Account linked to this user account is different than the Nintendo Account used on the previous system.This means all features that use the internet, like the Best Friends List, will be reset before the moving process continues. Proceed?
The save data for features that use the internet has been reset.
Please close the game using the HOME Menu. Then link a user account to the same Nintendo Account you used before moving. Finally, relaunch the game.
Close the game from the HOME Menu. Then relaunch the game with a user account linked to the same Nintendo Account you used before moving.

The target Nintendo Switch system does not have save data for the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game.If you continue the moving process, will become the Resident Representative on the target system's island. Proceed?
The save data transfer process will take some time. If you're playing in handheld mode, please connect the system to the Nintendo Switch AC adapter before beginning the save data transfer process.
